Collection.name: Records
Collection.type: Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1[[Eamon.Framework.IArtifact, Eamon, Version=1.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], Eamon, Version=1.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A black wooden torch sits here. You see an instruction label on the handle.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: small crypt

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small crypt sitting next to the fence here. The walls are weather-stained, and the door is hole-ridden. Etchings used to cover the walls, but now little remains to be seen.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: small tomb

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Rising from the ground here, you see a small tomb dedicated to some unknown person. The door, as with the rest of the foundation, is constructed of hewn granite. All are weather-beaten now.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Under the shading branches of the tree sits a crypt. The walls are stained with the passage of time, and the door as well. The latter, however, bears a strange symbol: three interconnected rings.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: wooden bucket

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a wooden bucket here, half full of dirt. It lies tipped over down in the grave.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A large shovel protrudes from a pile of dirt here.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You glimpse a solitary tombstone, about 5 feet in height, rising amongst the trees.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: large chest

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large chest sitting in the corner of the chamber, sheathed in cobwebs. It is closed and appears to be locked.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: weathered map

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a weathered map of the surrounding area. The thing is old and almost crumbles as you touch it.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: empty bottle

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a bottle with the label "TODO" on the front. Unfortunately, it is empty.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: steel gauntlet

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You've found a pair of steel gauntlets. Funny, you never saw these back in Marcos' shop.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: wine cask

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an old wine cask here, bound with iron bands. It was abandoned a while ago, yet the cork is still intact.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: crimson cloak

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have found a cloak, colored crimson red. Interwoven in with the fabric are tiny strands of a metallic substance.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: griffin egg

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large egg, possibly measuring a foot in diameter. It is colored brown, with light blue splotches.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: large nest

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A large nest, possibly 10 feet in diameter, sits on the ledge here. It is made mostly of sticks and grass, but several bones and shredded flesh are evident interwoven into the structure.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: large fountain

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large fountain, made of expertly crafted black marble, sitting against the back wall. A grotesque face, carved about five feet up, squirts from its mouth a constant stream of water into the basin.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: pile of gold

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a pile of gold coins at the bottom of the fountain. Apparently, it was once used as a wishing well.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: fence rod

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a long iron fence rod lying on the ground here. It was apparently broken off from the others.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: ancient parchment

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an old piece of parchment, inscribed upon which is some writing.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large sword, probably a cutlass, lying on the ground here.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: buried casket

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Half buried in the hole is a large casket, which is currently closed.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: crumbling skeleton

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a skeleton, partially clad in rotting clothing, lying in the pine box.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: bronze cross

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Clutched in the skeleton's bony hands is a finely constructed 1-foot tall cross made from tarnished bronze.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Lying next to the bucket is a coil of rope.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see some water.

Collection.name: FreeUids
Collection.type: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int64, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089
